about_the_game:
Discover Dreams, where the limit of your powers is your only imagination.
But in Dreams, you are not alone... And where the dream exists, the nightmare is not far away...

name: The Dreamwalkers Demo
short_description: The DreamWalkers is a narrative game with elements of visual novels and point & click. Take control of Morgan's destiny as he discovers the possibility of lucid dreaming. Help him make the right choices and explore Dreams to discover its secrets.
